member.name: P:NeverBounce.EmailValidationResult.Valid
member.summary: Indicates if the email address is valid.

member.name: P:NeverBounce.EmailValidationResult.EmailValidationFlags.ContainsAlias
member.summary: Flag to indicate if the address contains an alias.

member.name: P:NeverBounce.EmailValidationResult.EmailValidationFlags.HasDns
member.summary: A DNS record for the domain was found.

member.name: P:NeverBounce.EmailValidationResult.EmailValidationFlags.HasDnsMx
member.summary: An MX record was found for the domain.

member.name: P:NeverBounce.EmailValidationResult.EmailValidationFlags.IsFreeService
member.summary: Email is associated with a domain that provides email as a free service.

member.name: P:NeverBounce.EmailValidationResult.EmailValidationFlags.SmtpConnectable
member.summary: Mail server is connectable using SMTP.

member.name: P:NeverBounce.EmailValidationResult.EmailValidationFlags.IsDisposableAddress
member.summary: Email is from a domain that provides disposable addresses.

member.name: P:NeverBounce.NeverBounceClient.Logger
member.summary: Method to invoke to send log messages.

member.name: P:NeverBounce.NeverBounceClient.Endpoint
member.summary: Endpoint to which requests should be directed. Must be of the form (http||https)://[hostname]/.

member.name: F:NeverBounce.NeverBounceClient._Header
member.summary: Header to prepend to log messages.

member.name: P:NeverBounce.NeverBounceClient.RetryAttempts
member.summary: Number of times to retry if a failure result is detected.

member.name: T:NeverBounce.Timestamps
member.summary: Object used to measure start, end, and total time associated with an operation.

member.name: P:NeverBounce.Timestamps.Start
member.summary: The time at which the operation started.

member.name: P:NeverBounce.Timestamps.End
member.summary: The time at which the operation ended.

member.name: P:NeverBounce.Timestamps.TotalMs
member.summary: The total number of milliseconds that transpired between Start and End.
